name: Sleeping coffin 2
description:
Welcome to sleeping coffin 2. 

A new world has been born. Have fun on this adventure, choice-based, RPG  horror!  game.  Go on a fun adventure to save the world from the evil demon named Ve-lo and  discover the world of sleeping coffin.  

This game includes:

  •  Original soundtrack.
  • Friendly characters.
  • Voice acting.
  • unique boss designs with back story.
  • open world environment.
  • Great dialogue
  • multiple endings.
  • some comedy 

There is absolutely nothing wrong with the game just fun stuff and if you see any unnecessary information don't be alarmed.

HAVE FUNNNNNNNNNN!!!!!
